mapper.select: select tanamst.tai_cd "taiCd", tana_cd "tanaCd", tana_height "tanaHeight",tana_thickness "tanaThickness", tana_width "tanaWidth", tai_height "taiHeight" from planocycle.work_priority_order_pts_data_tanamst tanamst left join planocycle.work_priority_order_pts_data_taimst taimst on taimst.pts_cd=tanamst.pts_cd and taimst.tai_cd=tanamst.tai_cd inner join planocycle.work_priority_order_pts_data ptsdata on ptsdata.id=tanamst.pts_cd where shelf_pattern_cd=#{shelfPatternCd} and priority_order_cd=#{priorityOrderCd} order by tanamst.tai_cd, tana_cd
